00024                                                          {
00025     /*
00026     * Wake calculation method as a function of time.*
00027     */
00028     fTimeArray = NewTimeArray;
00029     fWake.resize(fTimeArray.size());
00030     std::fill_n(fWake.begin(), fWake.size(), 0);
00031     // util::dump(&fWake[0], 10, "start wake ");
00032 
00033     for (uint i = 0; i < fNResonators; ++i) {
00034         ftype alpha = fOmegaR[i] / (2 * fQ[i]);
00035         ftype omega_bar = std::sqrt(fOmegaR[i] * fOmegaR[i] - alpha * alpha);
00036 
00037         for (uint j = 0; j < fWake.size(); ++j) {
00038             ftype temp = fTimeArray[j];
00039             // util::dump(&temp, 1, "temp ");
00040             int sign = (temp > 0) - (temp < 0);
00041             fWake[j] += (sign + 1) * fRS[i] * alpha * std::exp(-alpha * temp) *
00042                         (std::cos(omega_bar * temp) -
00043                          alpha / omega_bar * std::sin(omega_bar * temp));
00044         }
00045     }
00046 }
